errors.requestFailed: The request failed. Please try again later.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your username to receive a password reset link at the email address associated with your account.
forgotPassword.checkInbox: If the username exists, you will receive a password reset link at the email address associated with your account.
forgotPassword.usernameRequired: Username is required to request a password reset

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Enter a new password for your account.
resetPassword.noToken: No token provided. Please request a new reset link.
resetPassword.invalidToken: The token is invalid or has expired. Please request a new reset link.
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been reset. You will be redirected to the login page.

wakeUpQuiz.title: Wake Up Quiz
wakeUpQuiz.subtitle: Test your forensic graphology and general culture knowledge with our AI-powered interactive quiz system
wakeUpQuiz.newQuizDescription: Choose a category and start a new quiz session

categories.graphologyDesc: Specialized questions on authentication techniques, parametric analysis, and forensic methodology.
categories.cultureDesc: Test your knowledge on various topics to keep your mind alert and curious.
categories.mixedDesc: A complete challenge that combines specialized and general culture questions for complete training.

activeSessionWarning.title: Active Sessions Found
activeSessionWarning.description: You have active quiz sessions. You can resume them or start a new quiz.

statisticsDialog.title: Quiz Statistics
statisticsDialog.subtitle: Your performance in the Wake Up system

suggestions.studyMistakes: Study topics where you made mistakes

statisticsDialog.studyMoreMessage: You need to study more to improve your knowledge.
statisticsDialog.question: Question
statisticsDialog.notAnsweredYet: You haven't answered this question yet.

sessionCompleted.title: Quiz Completed!
sessionCompleted.description: Well done! You've completed the quiz session.
